description: Send a TTS message to Snips to listen for a response.

site_id.description: Site to use to start session, defaults to default (optional)

custom_data.description: custom data that will be included with all messages in this session

can_be_enqueued.description: If True, session waits for an open session to end, if False session is dropped if one is running

intent_filter.description: Optional Array of Strings - A list of intents names to restrict the NLU resolution to on the first query.
